title: Hands-on: Must-have Mac accessories to streamline your setup [Video]
content:
As I’ve overhauled my setup in the last few weeks in conjunction with the new Mac Studio, I’ve used this as an opportunity to add some new accessories as well. This includes a new OWC Thunderbolt Dock, a nifty Magic Keyboard and Magic Trackpad accessory from Twelve South, and more. Head below for the details.

more…

The post Hands-on: Must-have Mac accessories to streamline your setup [Video] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: One of the best things about buying a Mac is the array of accessories available. Here are some of the best Mac accessories we've tried.
